title: Snip, Snail & Dog Tail
original_name: スニップ,スネイル&ドッグテイル
sinopse:
Mine the translator and Anjou the bus driver are new friends. Mine is awkward and hard working, while Anjou is candid and has a girlfriend. They're very different from each other. However, they quickly became friends, and start to feel a sense of distance from each other.

(Source: Shodensha, translated)
